section.title: Disable CDE ToolTalk Database Server
section.para:
Disables the Local CDE ToolTalk Database Server. The ToolTalk service enables independent Common Desktop Environment (CDE) desktop applications to communicate with each other without having direct knowledge of each other. CDE
Common Desktop Environment
If you are not using the Solaris CDE, it is recommend to apply this module.
